goals.question: What is the trend of CO2 concentration over time?
goals.visualization: Line chart of CO2 concentration over time
goals.rationale: This visualization helps to identify if there is an increase or decrease in CO2 concentration over time.

goals.question: What is the average CO2 concentration by year?
goals.visualization: Bar chart of average CO2 concentration by year
goals.rationale: This visualization helps to identify the year with the highest and lowest average CO2 concentration.

goals.question: What is the distribution of CO2 concentration?
goals.rationale: This visualization helps to identify the range of CO2 concentration values and if there are any outliers.

goals.question: What is the correlation between CO2 concentration and temperature?
goals.visualization: Scatter plot of CO2 concentration and temperature
goals.rationale: This visualization helps to identify if there is a positive or negative correlation between CO2 concentration and temperature.

goals.question: What is the seasonal pattern of CO2 concentration?
goals.visualization: Line chart of CO2 concentration by month
goals.rationale: This visualization helps to identify if there is a seasonal pattern in CO2 concentration and if there are any trends over time.

code:
import seaborn as sns
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    data['date'] = pd.to_datetime(data['date'], format='%Y-%m-%d', errors='coerce')
    chart = sns.lineplot(x='date', y='co2_concentration', data=data)
    chart.axhline(y=data['co2_concentration'].mean(), color='r', linestyle='--', label='Mean CO2 concentration: {:.2f}'.format(data['co2_concentration'].mean()))
    chart.legend()
    return chart

chart = plot(data)

import seaborn as sns
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    data['Year'] = pd.to_datetime(data['Year'], format='%Y', errors='coerce')
    data['Year'] = data['Year'].dt.year
    data = data.groupby('Year').mean().reset_index()
    chart = sns.barplot(x='Year', y='CO2 concentration (ppm)', data=data)
    chart.axhline(y=data['CO2 concentration (ppm)'].max(), color='red', linestyle='--', label=f"Max: {data['CO2 concentration (ppm)'].max():.2f}")
    chart.axhline(y=data['CO2 concentration (ppm)'].min(), color='green', linestyle='--', label=f"Min: {data['CO2 concentration (ppm)'].min():.2f}")
    chart.legend()
    return chart

chart = plot(data)

import seaborn as sns
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    data['CO2 concentration'] = pd.to_numeric(data['CO2 concentration'], errors='coerce')
    sns.histplot(data=data, x='CO2 concentration', kde=True, color='blue')
    plt.axvline(data['CO2 concentration'].mean(), color='red', label=f"Mean: {data['CO2 concentration'].mean():.2f}")
    plt.legend()
    plt.title('What is the distribution of CO2 concentration?', wrap=True)
    return plt

chart = plot(data)

import seaborn as sns
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    data['Date'] = pd.to_datetime(data['Date'], format='%Y-%m-%d', errors='coerce')
    sns.scatterplot(x='CO2 concentration (ppm)', y='Temperature (deg F)', data=data)
    plt.title('What is the correlation between CO2 concentration and temperature?', wrap=True)
    return plt;

chart = plot(data)

import seaborn as sns
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    data['date'] = pd.to_datetime(data['date'], format='%Y-%m-%d', errors='coerce')
    data['month'] = data['date'].dt.month
    data = data.groupby('month').mean().reset_index()
    chart = sns.lineplot(x='month', y='co2', data=data)
    chart.axhline(y=data['co2'].mean(), color='r', linestyle='--', label='Average CO2 concentration')
    chart.legend()
    return chart

chart = plot(data)

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    data['Year'] = pd.to_datetime(data['Year'], format='%Y', errors='coerce')
    data['Year'] = data['Year'].dt.year
    data = data.groupby('Year').mean().reset_index()
    chart = sns.barplot(x='Year', y='CO2 concentration (ppm)', data=data)
    chart.axhline(y=data['CO2 concentration (ppm)'].max(), color='red', linestyle='--', label=f"Max: {data['CO2 concentration (ppm)'].max():.2f}")
